statements: UPDATE data_security SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_security SET data = 'Updated Data', security_level = 'High' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE data_security SET security_level = 'High', data = 'Confidential' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_security SET compliance_status = true, security_level = 'Medium' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE data_security SET password='newpassword123' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE compliance SET data_type='Sensitive' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE data_security SET password='newPassword123', email='newemail@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE compliance SET access_level='admin', data_type='confidential' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE data_security SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password = 'newpassword123' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE compliance SET regulations = 'GDPR' WHERE organization = 'Company XYZ';
UPDATE data_security SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1001;
UPDATE compliance SET organization='Company X', compliance_level=3 WHERE regulations='GDPR';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'login', access_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', password_hash='newpasswordhash' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE roles SET role_name='admin', permissions='{'read': true, 'write': true, 'delete': false}' WHERE role_id='234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE big_data_users SET email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE data_access_logs SET accessed_table = 'data_table' WHERE log_id = 67890;
UPDATE big_data_users SET username = 'john_doe', date_registered = NOW() WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE data_access_logs SET access_type = 'READ', access_time = '2022-08-15 10:30:00', accessed_table = 'financial_data' WHERE user_id = 54321;
